name: Ascend X: Glow Bubble Jump - by Cobalt Play Games
name_original: Ascend X: Glow Bubble Jump - by Cobalt Play Games
description:
????????? Can you last 50 seconds ?????????
!!!!!!!!!! The world best record so far is 101 seconds !!!!!!!!!!!

Please send your score to games@cobaltplay.com and we'll add it to top players board in facebook.

So so easy to play. Tap anywhere on the screen to make your bubble jump left and right on the screen. Don't hit the falling squares and travel for as long as you can.

Similar to ninjump and retro arcade games, Ascend X is an addictive little gem that anyone can play. The first 10 seconds are just a warm up, once the diagonal squares spawn it's time to start working that calculator brain to find the best escape. Keep climbing for as long as you can. Climb baby climb ;D

Download it for FREE and play our top game today!

Happy Gaming :)
The Cobalt Play Team
